biography:
From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia.

Jasmin Dizdar (8 June 1961, Zenica, BiH) is a London-based screenwriter, film director and author on cinema. He is known for his film Beautiful People which won an award for the best film in Un Certain Regard category at the Cannes Film Festival.

name: Jasmin Dizdar
